header.title: Build parameters
header.subtitle: Enter the current characteristics of the build, as well as restrictions for the final solution

tooltip.title: The amount of HP of the build only with the base, weapons, chassis and necessary modules
tooltip.subtitle: Located in the build characteristics section

tooltip.title: Weight of the build only with the base, weapons, chassis and necessary modules
tooltip.subtitle: Located in the build characteristics section

tooltip.title: Maximum load capacity of the build up to the red line of the load capacity scale
tooltip.subtitle: Shown when hovering over the load capacity bar

tooltip.title: Number of parts currently installed on the build
tooltip.subtitle: Located in the build characteristics section

tooltip.title: Maximum number of parts for a build. Standard: 80 - normal build, 180 - leviathan
tooltip.subtitle: Located in the build characteristics section

tooltip.title: The number of Power Scores that the build currently has
tooltip.subtitle: Located in the build characteristics section

tooltip.title: The maximum number of Power Scores that you need to get in the end. Leave 99999 if there are no restrictions
tooltip.subtitle: Cannot be less than the current PP value

tooltip.title: Parts whose strength is lower than specified will not be taken into account in the solution
If you have a cabin installed, upgraded +10% to durability, this bonus will be taken into account
If you have a “Grizzly” co-driver installed, 5% of the build’s durability will be taken into account
Parts that should definitely be included or excluded in the final solution sample
